body_html:
I am not sure, if we need to adapt save method for Eager, but I would at least add an explicit reference to tfe.Checkpoint and docs, so once a person sees it she or he can figure out what to do next.

Please let me know if I can help

body:
I am not sure, if we need to adapt save method for Eager, but I would at least add an explicit reference to `tfe.Checkpoint` and docs, so once a person sees it she or he can figure out what to do next.

Please let me know if I can help
